text: George William Byers (born 29 May 1996) is a professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Swansea City. ==Club career== ===Watford=== Byers is a youth product of Watford academy, joining the club aged 7. He was included in the 2013–14 pre-season camp in Italy. On 12 May 2014, Byers signed professional deal with Watford. On 17 January 2015, Byers made his senior debut as a substitute in a match against Charlton Athletic. On 3 June 2016, it was announced that Byers would leave Watford upon his contract expiry. ===Swansea City=== On 11 July 2016, preceding Byers release from Watford, he joined Premier League rivals Swansea City. He made his debut for Swansea on 28 August 2018 in a 1–0 defeat to Crystal Palace in the EFL Cup. ==International career== Byers has represented Scotland at both under-16 and under-17 level. ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|FA Cup !colspan="2"|League Cup !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="3"|Watford |2014–15 |Championship |1||0||0||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||1||0 |- |2015–16 |Premier League |0||0||0||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||0||0 |- !colspan="2"|Total !1!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!colspan="2"|—!!1!!0 |- |rowspan="4"|Swansea City U23 |2016–17 |colspan="3" |—|| colspan="2" |—|| colspan="2" |—||6||0||6||0 |- |2017–18 |colspan="3" |—|| colspan="2" |—|| colspan="2" |—||4||0||4||0 |- |2018–19 |colspan="3" |—|| colspan="2" |—|| colspan="2" |—||1||0||1||0 |- !colspan="2"|Total !colspan="2" |—|| colspan="2" |—|| colspan="2" |—||11||0||11||0 |- |rowspan="5"|Swansea City |2016–17 |Premier League |0||0||0||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||0||0 |- |2017–18 |Premier League |0||0||0||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||0||0 |- |2018–19 |Championship |21||2||3||1||1||0||colspan="2"|—||25||3 |- |2019–20 |Championship |12||1||0||0||3||2||colspan="2"|—||15||3 |- !colspan="2"|Total !33!!3!!3!!1!!4!!2!!colspan="2"|—!!40!!6 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !34!!3!!3!!1!!4!!2!!11!!0!!52!!6 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Scottish footballers Category:Footballers from Ilford Category:Association football midfielders Category:English Football League players Category:Watford F.C. players Category:Swansea City A.F.C. players Category:Scotland youth international footballers Category:English footballers Category:English people of Scottish descent
